sentences.sContent: While criticizing neo-realism and neo-functionalism, researchers adhering to the epistemic community approach (ECA) emphasize the importance of original ideas in the policy-shaping process.
sentences.sContent_eng: While criticizing neo-realism and neo-functionalism, researchers adhering to the epistemic community approach (ECA) emphasize the importance of original ideas in the policy-shaping process.
sentences.sCn: 晚近针对「新现实主义」与「新功能主义」之批判所发展出的「知识社群」研究取向，强调原创理念在政策塑过程中所扮演之重要角色。

words.tran: 机能主义的；实用主义的
功能地；函数地；职务上地
功能；[数] 函数；职责；盛大的集会
功能；[数] 泛函性，函数性
机能主义者；实用主义者

trans.tranCn: 功能主义, 机能心理学
trans.tranOther: the idea that the most important thing about a building, piece of furniture etc is that it is useful
